_source.text: A 2013 Cochrane review-considered a gold standard for large systematic reviews of health research-notes, for instance, that when it comes to anxiety disorders, seeing a therapist in person is most likely superior to self-help based on books and on apps but that "self-help is probably better than no treatment."
